publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3384.1 Mr Keith Harding: Review of Secondary School Accommodation in North East Fife-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3384) in the name of Iain Smith, after "St Andrews" insert "the early completion of a single-site school for Bell Baxter School, Cupar,"
S1M-3384.1 Review of Secondary School Accommodation in North East Fife (lodged on 19 September 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Murdo Fraser*
